p: Statistical analyses were performed with Stata version 13 (StataCorp. 2013) [ 47]. A chi-square test was performed to test the possible association between gender difference and RVA status. Studentâ€™s t-test was performed to ascertain the equality of means of RVA positive and negative for continuous variables; age, weight, height, temperature, vomiting (duration and episodes), diarrhea (duration and episodes) and dehydration. Statistical significance was defined as p < 0.05.
